title: The Bible and Aliens - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/14/19
itunes:title: The Bible and Aliens - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/14/19
description:
George Noory and author Dr. Rita Louise explore her theory that an alien race could have created human life by using alien DNA, and if stories like the snake tempting Adam and Eve in the Garden of Eden were actually about aliens on Earth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
